attributes.action: initiate effective controls  to curb the excesses of the banking sector in this country to ensure the public receives fair treatment and value for money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having assisted in bringing the economy to the brink of collapse through the shortcomings of senior management and, having been bailed out with public funds, the banks still appear to have little regard for their customers or the public money thay have absorbed. The Fat Cat culture is still evident and people continue to be hugely rewarded for failure with golden hand shakes using these funds.

Attitudes of the banking sector appear cavalier with a take it or leave it mindset and it also appears they have the country over a barrel
